Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 3 showed the oxidation of cyclic voltammograms of the polymer films on graphite disk electrode in tetrabutyl ammonium hexafluorophosphate ( Bu 4 NPF 6 ) solution ( 0.1 M in acetonitrile ) at a scan rate of 50 mV s^-1 .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| cyclic voltammograms of the polymer films |
| graphite disk electrode |
| tetrabutyl ammonium hexafluorophosphate (Bu 4 NPF 6) |
| acetonitrile (0.1 M) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| cyclic voltammograms of the polymer films |
| tetrabutyl ammonium hexafluorophosphate (Bu 4 NPF 6) |
| acetonitrile |

Note: "graphite disk electrode" is not a material in this context, but rather an electrode used for the experiment.

The following entities were removed as they do not clearly refer to material properties:

* "in" in "in acetonitrile" is a preposition and does not refer to a material property.
* "the" before "oxidation of cyclic voltammograms" and "of the polymer films" are definite articles and do not refer to material properties.
